roleset.name: edit, work on text (etc), amend text or media
roleset.note: EDIT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'edit' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from edit.01-v predicate notes)
EDITING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, edit-v.01. No VNcls. (from editing.01-n)

example.name: getting tired of hapax
example.text: Optical-storage devices can handle very large amounts of data and make it far easier [*] to edit film clips or audio recordings with a computer.

example.name: both args
example.text: His career as a journalist began in high school with his editing the school newspaper and yearbook while also having a part-time job at the Pittsburgh Courier.
example.arg: while also having a part-time job at the Pittsburgh Courier
